text: Pyrenean Mastiff is a mastiff or livestock guardian-type dog that descends from the Great Pyrenees and the Spanish Mastiff. This dog is very fluffy. This dog does not descend from Newfoundland instead it descends from the Great Pyrenees and the Mastin Espanol (AKA Spanish Mastiff). Category:Dog breeds Category:FCI breeds
title: Pyrenean Mastiff
